title: Bandle city and the Map
body: I was looking at bandle city in the Map of Runeterra and I saw that Heimer was not in it but is from piltover? And where is Amumu from? I'm kinda confused,please help!{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: Heimerdinger lives a life in Piltover as a glamoured Yordle posing as a human. Ziggs used to live with him until he met Jinx and now lives in Zaun blowing stuff up - although he has strong feelings against senseless killing and he tries to make Jinx tone down her killing sprees.

> [{quoted}](name=Hovering Hentai,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JvLgW2qx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-30T12:08:02.957+0000)
>
> Heimerdinger lives a life in Piltover as a glamoured Yordle posing as a human. Ziggs used to live with him until he met Jinx and now livesin Zuan blowing stuff up - although he has strong feelings against senseless killing and he tries to make Jinx tone down her killing sprees.

Yep!  As shown in Ziggs & Jinx: Paint the Town comic :D
https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/comic/jinx-ziggs/paint-the-town/0/
It's unknown wether Amumu is a child or a yordle AFAIK
